title: YOGA FOR LOWER BACK PAIN + TIGHTNESS ~Gentle Beginner Friendly Yoga Stretches For Back Pain(10 mins)
description:
Hello Yogis! this gentle, beginner friendly lower back focused practice will help you ease some of the tension/ tightness you might  experiencing as we slowly lengthen our spine & hips. You can always come back to this simple practice whenever you need. If your'e sitting a lot this is also a great practice to come back to in the evenings. Hope this helps let me know how you go!

comments:
Hey guys this came as a request, hope this lower back focused practice helps! Also THANK YOU for 1000 subs! I love creating for you guys :) Let's chat more in the comments below I'd love to hear from you! Please consider subscribing if you havent already 🥰






YOGA FOR LOWER BACK PAIN + TIGHTNESS ~Gentle Beginner Friendly Yoga Stretches For Back Pain(10 mins)
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rzGB7UxB9ws

My mom has a back pain for 7 months and it is getting worse when the pain runs to her legs. I sent her your video and after 3 days, doing this twice per day, she told me the pain had been released and it really worked.
I have the worst lower back pain I’ve ever had, and this gave me so much relief. Second day doing it, thank you
im only 17 but dealing with some unbearable back pain and this made me finally feel well, thanks!

I'm 23...I never really thought I was out of shape or my body was aging beyond my years, but good GOD I'm more out of shape than I thought. This was harder and more painful than any workout I could do at the gym. I have such terrible tightness in my hamstrings and groin-pelvic muscles, I couldn't even go half as far as you did in the video. Looks like I'll need to keep this up for a while, lol.
